  constraint
 svt_axi_port_configuration::valid_ranges

constraint valid_ranges {
      cache_line_state_change_type inside {RECOMMENDED_CACHE_LINE_STATE_CHANGE,LEGAL_WITH_SNOOP_FILTER_CACHE_LINE_STATE_CHANGE,LEGAL_WITHOUT_SNOOP_FILTER_CACHE_LINE_STATE_CHANGE};
     (axi_interface_type == AXI3 || axi_interface_type == AXI4_LITE ||
      axi_interface_type == AXI_ACE || axi_interface_type == ACE_LITE ) -> (axi_interface_category == AXI_READ_WRITE);
             id_width inside {[0: 8]};
      read_chan_id_width inside {[0: 8]};
      write_chan_id_width inside {[0: 8]};
      if(ace_version == ACE_VERSION_2_0){
      axi_interface_type inside{AXI4,AXI4_LITE,ACE_LITE,AXI_ACE};
   }
         if(acwakeup_enable ==1){
      axi_interface_type inside {ACE_LITE,AXI_ACE};
    }
    if(axi_interface_type != ACE_LITE || ace_version != ACE_VERSION_2_0){
       cache_stashing_enable ==0;
      }
     if((!(axi_interface_type inside {ACE_LITE,AXI4,AXI_ACE})) || (ace_version != ACE_VERSION_2_0)){
       addr_translation_enable ==0;
      }
    if((!(axi_interface_type inside {ACE_LITE,AXI4,AXI4_LITE,AXI_ACE})) || (ace_version != ACE_VERSION_2_0)){
       awakeup_enable ==0;
      }
     if((!(axi_interface_type inside {ACE_LITE,AXI_ACE})) || (ace_version != ACE_VERSION_2_0)){
       acwakeup_enable ==0;
      }
     if((!(axi_interface_type inside {ACE_LITE,AXI4,AXI4_LITE,AXI_ACE}))|| (ace_version != ACE_VERSION_2_0) || (trace_tag_enable ==0)){
        loopback_trace_tag_enable==0;
      }
     if((!(axi_interface_type inside {ACE_LITE,AXI4,AXI4_LITE,AXI_ACE})) || (ace_version != ACE_VERSION_2_0)){
       trace_tag_enable ==0;
      }
            if(atomic_transactions_enable && enable_loopback_signaling ) {
       write_loop_width == read_loop_width;
   }
   if (enable_non_secure_access_identifiers) {
      nsaid_width <= 4;
   }
       if(ace_version==ACE_VERSION_2_0 && atomic_transactions_enable ) {
        data_width inside {8,16,32,64};
     }
                 if(ace_version==ACE_VERSION_2_0 ) {
      barrier_enable == 0;
    }
         if(axi_interface_type != ACE_LITE || ace_version != ACE_VERSION_2_0){
       write_plus_cmo_enable ==0;
    }
     if((!(axi_interface_type inside {ACE_LITE,AXI4})) || (ace_version != ACE_VERSION_2_0) || (use_separate_rd_wr_chan_id_width !=0)){
        atomic_transactions_enable==0;
    }
         if(use_external_port_monitor) {
      if((!(axi_interface_type inside {ACE_LITE, AXI4})) || (ace_version != ACE_VERSION_2_0) || (data_width < 32)){
        mte_support_type == MTE_FALSE;
      }
    }
         if(rdata_chunking_enable) {
       rchunknum_width inside {1,5,6,7,8};
       rchunkstrb_width inside {1,2,4,8};
       axi_interface_type inside {AXI4,ACE_LITE};
    }
         if (ace_version != ACE_VERSION_2_0) {
      enable_mpam == MPAM_FALSE;
    }
         if (enable_mpam != MPAM_FALSE) {
      mpam_perfmongroup_width == 1;
    }
    if (enable_mpam == MPAM_9_1) {
      mpam_partid_width == 9;
    }
    else if (enable_mpam == MPAM_12_1) {
      mpam_partid_width == 12;
    }
         if((!(axi_interface_type inside {ACE_LITE, AXI4})) || (ace_version != ACE_VERSION_2_0)){
      fixed_burst_disable == FIXED_BURST_DISABLE_FALSE;
    }
      if (axi_port_kind == AXI_MASTER) {
       if (!(axi_interface_type == AXI_ACE && ace_version == ACE_VERSION_2_0)) {
         sysco_interface_enable == 0;
       }
     }
     else {
       sysco_interface_enable == 0;
     }
      if (!(axi_interface_type == AXI4 && ace_version == ACE_VERSION_2_0 && arqos_enable && awqos_enable)) {
       qos_accept_signaling_enable == 0;
     }
      if (axi_port_kind == AXI_MASTER)
         {
            if((axi_interface_category == AXI_READ_ONLY)|| (axi_interface_category == AXI_WRITE_ONLY))
           {
          exclusive_access_enable == 0;
          exclusive_monitor_enable == 0;
           }
         }
        barrier_id_min >= 0;
      if (use_separate_rd_wr_chan_id_width == 0) {
        barrier_id_min <= ((1<<(id_width))-1);
      } else if (read_chan_id_width < write_chan_id_width) {
        barrier_id_min <= ((1<<(read_chan_id_width))-1);
      } else {
        barrier_id_min <= ((1<<(write_chan_id_width))-1);
      }
      barrier_id_max >= 0;
      if (use_separate_rd_wr_chan_id_width == 0) {
        barrier_id_max <= ((1<<(id_width))-1);
      } else if (read_chan_id_width < write_chan_id_width) {
        barrier_id_max <= ((1<<(read_chan_id_width))-1);
      } else {
        barrier_id_max <= ((1<<(write_chan_id_width))-1);
      }
      barrier_id_min < barrier_id_max;
      dvm_id_min >= 0;
      if (use_separate_rd_wr_chan_id_width == 0) {
        dvm_id_min <= ((1<<(id_width))-1);
      } else {
        dvm_id_min <= ((1<<(read_chan_id_width))-1);
      }
      dvm_id_max >= 0;
      if (use_separate_rd_wr_chan_id_width == 0) {
        dvm_id_max <= ((1<<(id_width))-1);
      } else {
        dvm_id_max <= ((1<<(read_chan_id_width))-1);
      }
      dvm_id_min < dvm_id_max;
       addr_width inside {[1:( 64-num_enabled_tagged_addr_attributes)]};
      addr_user_width inside {[1: 4]};
      log_base_2_data_width inside {[ 3:log_base_2_max_data_width]};
                                  if (log_base_2_data_width < 8) {
        log_base_2_cache_line_size inside {[4:((log_base_2_data_width-3)+4)]};
      } else {
        log_base_2_cache_line_size inside {[(log_base_2_data_width-3):(((log_base_2_data_width-3)+4))]};
      }
       if (log_base_2_data_width < 8) {
        log_base_2_atomicity_size inside {[4:((log_base_2_data_width-3)+4)]};
      } else {
        log_base_2_atomicity_size inside {[(log_base_2_data_width-3):(((log_base_2_data_width-3)+4))]};
      }
       if (log_base_2_max_snoop_data_width < (log_base_2_cache_line_size+3))
        log_base_2_snoop_data_width inside {[((log_base_2_cache_line_size+3)-4):log_base_2_max_snoop_data_width]};
      else
        log_base_2_snoop_data_width inside {[((log_base_2_cache_line_size+3)-4):(log_base_2_cache_line_size+3)]};
      data_width == (1 << log_base_2_data_width);
      data_user_width inside {[1: 8]};
      resp_user_width inside {[1: 4]};
      cache_line_size == (1 << log_base_2_cache_line_size);
      snoop_data_width == (1 << log_base_2_snoop_data_width);
      snoop_data_width inside {32, 64, 128, 256, 512,1024};
      if ( atomicity_size > -1)
      atomicity_size == (1 << log_base_2_atomicity_size);
                                  num_cache_lines inside {[ 1: 1024]};
      if(num_associative_cache_ways > 0)
        (num_cache_lines%num_associative_cache_ways) == 0;
      num_outstanding_xact inside {-1,[1: 128]};
       num_outstanding_atomic_xact inside {[1: 128]};
      num_read_outstanding_xact inside {[1: 128]};
      num_write_outstanding_xact inside {[1: 128]};
      num_outstanding_snoop_xact inside {[1: 10]};
      max_num_exclusive_access inside {[0: 4]};
      num_id_bits_used_in_exclusive_monitor inside {[0:-1]};
      (num_addr_bits_used_in_exclusive_monitor+num_initial_addr_bits_ignored_by_exclusive_monitor) inside {[0:-1]};
      write_data_interleave_depth inside {[1: 1]};
      read_data_reordering_depth inside {[1: 8]};
      read_data_interleave_size inside {[1: 4]};
      write_resp_reordering_depth inside {[1: 8]};
       (tdata_enable == 0) -> (tstrb_enable == 0);
      (tkeep_enable == 0) -> (tstrb_enable == 0);
      tdata_width inside {[8: 128]};
      tdata_width == ((tdata_width >> 3) << 3);
      tid_width inside {[1: 8]};
      tdest_width inside {[1: 4]};
      tuser_width inside {[1: 8]};
      stream_interleave_depth inside {[1: 1]};
     if (axi_interface_type == AXI3) {
      awid_enable == 1;
      awlen_enable == 1;
      awsize_enable == 1;
      awburst_enable == 1;
      awlock_enable == 1;
      awcache_enable == 1;
      awprot_enable == 1;
      wstrb_enable == 1;
      if (axi_port_kind == AXI_MASTER) {
          wlast_enable == 1;
      }
      bid_enable == 1;
      bresp_enable == 1;
      arid_enable == 1;
      arlen_enable == 1;
      arsize_enable == 1;
      arburst_enable == 1;
      arlock_enable == 1;
      arcache_enable == 1;
      arprot_enable == 1;
      rid_enable == 1;
      rresp_enable == 1;
      if (axi_port_kind == AXI_SLAVE) {
          rlast_enable == 1;
      }
       awregion_enable == 0;
      awqos_enable == 0;
      arregion_enable == 0;
      arqos_enable == 0;
      barrier_enable == 0;
      dvm_enable == 0;
    } else {
      locked_access_enable == 0;
    }
     if (axi_interface_type == AXI4_LITE) {
      awprot_enable == 1;
      wstrb_enable == 1;
      bresp_enable == 1;
      arprot_enable == 1;
      rresp_enable == 1;
      awlen_enable == 0;
      arlen_enable == 0;
      awburst_enable == 0;
      arburst_enable == 0;
      awlock_enable == 0;
      arlock_enable == 0;
      awcache_enable == 0;
      arcache_enable == 0;
      wlast_enable == 0;
      rlast_enable == 0;
      if(ace_version == ACE_VERSION_2_0) {
        data_width inside {8,16, 32, 64, 128, 256, 512,1024};
        awid_enable == 1;
        bid_enable == 1;
        rid_enable == 1;
        awsize_enable == 1;
        arsize_enable == 1;
      }
      else {
        data_width inside {32, 64};
        awsize_enable == 0;
        arsize_enable == 0;
        if (id_reflection_enable == 1) {
          awid_enable == 1;
          bid_enable == 1;
          rid_enable == 1;
        }
      }
      exclusive_access_enable == 0;
      exclusive_monitor_enable == 0;
      barrier_enable == 0;
      dvm_enable == 0;
     }
     if ((axi_interface_type == AXI_ACE) || (axi_interface_type == ACE_LITE)) {
      if (snoop_filter_enable == 1)
        cache_line_state_change_type != LEGAL_WITHOUT_SNOOP_FILTER_CACHE_LINE_STATE_CHANGE;
      else
        cache_line_state_change_type != LEGAL_WITH_SNOOP_FILTER_CACHE_LINE_STATE_CHANGE;
    }
     if((axi_interface_type == AXI_ACE) && (dvm_enable == 1))
      addr_width >= 32;
     if ((axi_port_kind == AXI_MASTER) &&
        ((axi_interface_type == AXI4) || (axi_interface_type == AXI_ACE) || (axi_interface_type == ACE_LITE))) {
      if (axi_interface_category == AXI_READ_WRITE) {
        awprot_enable == 1;
        wlast_enable == 1;
        arprot_enable == 1;
      }
      if (axi_interface_category == AXI_READ_ONLY) {
        arprot_enable == 1;
        awid_enable == 0;
        awlen_enable == 0;
        awsize_enable == 0;
        awburst_enable == 0;
        awlock_enable == 0;
        wstrb_enable == 0;
        awregion_enable == 0;
        awcache_enable == 0;
        awqos_enable == 0;
      }
      if (axi_interface_category == AXI_WRITE_ONLY) {
        awprot_enable == 1;
        wlast_enable == 1;
        arid_enable == 0;
        arlen_enable == 0;
        arsize_enable == 0;
        arburst_enable == 0;
        arlock_enable == 0;
        arregion_enable == 0;
        arcache_enable == 0;
        arqos_enable == 0;
      }
    }
     if (axi_port_kind == AXI_SLAVE) {
      if ((axi_interface_type == AXI4) || (axi_interface_type == AXI_ACE) || (axi_interface_type == ACE_LITE)) {
        write_resp_wait_for_addr_accept == 1;
        if (axi_interface_category == AXI_READ_WRITE) {
          awid_enable == 1;
          awlen_enable == 1;
          awsize_enable == 1;
          awburst_enable == 1;
          wstrb_enable == 1;
          bid_enable == 1;
          arid_enable == 1;
          arlen_enable == 1;
          arsize_enable == 1;
          arburst_enable == 1;
          rid_enable == 1;
          rlast_enable == 1;
          awakeup_enable >= 0;
          awakeup_enable <= 1;
          awakeup_toggle_min_delay_during_idle == 0;//;
          awakeup_toggle_max_delay_during_idle >= 4;
          awakeup_toggle_max_delay_during_idle <= 8;
          acwakeup_toggle_min_delay_during_idle >= 0;
          acwakeup_toggle_min_delay_during_idle <= 3;
          acwakeup_toggle_max_delay_during_idle >= 4;
          acwakeup_toggle_max_delay_during_idle <= 8;
        }
        if (axi_interface_category == AXI_READ_ONLY) {
          arid_enable == 1;
          arlen_enable == 1;
          arsize_enable == 1;
          arburst_enable == 1;
          rid_enable == 1;
          rlast_enable == 1;
          awid_enable == 0;
          awlen_enable == 0;
          awsize_enable == 0;
          awburst_enable == 0;
          wstrb_enable == 0;
          bid_enable == 0;
          awregion_enable == 0;
          awcache_enable == 0;
          awqos_enable == 0;
          awlock_enable == 0;
          awprot_enable == 0;
          wlast_enable == 0;
          bresp_enable == 0;
        }
        if (axi_interface_category == AXI_WRITE_ONLY) {
          awid_enable == 1;
          awlen_enable == 1;
          awsize_enable == 1;
          awburst_enable == 1;
          wstrb_enable == 1;
          bid_enable == 1;
          arid_enable == 0;
          arlen_enable == 0;
          arsize_enable == 0;
          arburst_enable == 0;
          rid_enable == 0;
          rlast_enable == 0;
          arregion_enable == 0;
          arcache_enable == 0;
          arqos_enable == 0;
          arlock_enable == 0;
          arprot_enable == 0;
          rresp_enable == 0;
        }
      }
    }
     if (axi_interface_type == ACE_LITE)
      writeevict_enable == 0;
     if (writeevict_enable == 1) awunique_enable == 1;
     if (locked_access_enable)
      num_outstanding_xact != -1;
     if (axi_slv_channel_buffers_enable)
      toggle_ready_signals_during_idle_period == 0;
    }
